name.description: Full official name of the company

englishName.description: English version of the company name if available

representativePhoneNumber.description: Contact phone number of the legal representative

phoneNumber.description: Main contact phone number of the company

address.description: Full physical address of the company headquarters

issuedAt.description: Date when the business registration was issued, in ISO format or DD/MM/YYYY

terminatedAt.description: Date when the company was terminated, if applicable

numberOfStaffs.description: Number of employees in the company

currentStatus.description: Current operational status of the company

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the company record was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the company record was last updated

deletedAt.description: Timestamp when the company record was soft deleted, if applicable

director.description: Name of the company director or CEO

directorPhoneNumber.description: Contact phone number of the director

commencementDate.description: Date when the company started operations

accountCreatedAt.description: Date when the company account was created in the system

taxAuthority.description: Name of the tax authority responsible for the company

businessLines.description: List of business activities the company is registered for

isPrimary.description: Indicates if this is the primary business activity
